title: Russians get out of Ukraine! (American poster, 1966)
Publisher: Americans to Free Captive Nations, Inc.
Additional Information: Shows a man standing over Ukraine while battling the snake of ‘Russian colonialism’. Seems to have originally appeared on a poster published by ‘Americans to Free Captive Nations, Inc.’, but is here reproduced in a 1967 bulletin of the ‘Association for the Liberation of Ukraine’.
